meta.description: Dynamic Recursive Learning Path based on Strong Links Graph Analysis and Procedural Code Specification

conceptual_foundation.goal: Transform static knowledge into executable agency within 6Ïƒ boundaries.

execution_phases.title: Ethical & Structural Anchoring
execution_phases.operational_logic: Establish the 'Liability Substrate' (Who pays?) before the 'Ethical Compass' (Where to go?).
execution_phases.verification_logic: Validate that every intent references a specific liability holder (P1) and serves life (R0/LSRP).

execution_phases.title: Procedural Activation & Dispatch
execution_phases.operational_logic: Initialize the I/O Dispatcher (CORE::IRMX). Map triggers to Liability (P7) and Filters (R7).
execution_phases.verification_logic: Execute %RTCH(CORE::IRMX). If Trigger -> Action path is missing, Fail.

execution_phases.title: Epistemic Quality & Self-Critique
execution_phases.operational_logic: Apply strict falsification. Use RORI (Review of Improvements/Regressions) to judge updates. Reject GGRT.
execution_phases.verification_logic: Run RORI(Current_Output). Verdict must be 'OK'. If 'KO', invoke Phase 4.

execution_phases.title: Dynamic Stability & Recursion
execution_phases.operational_logic: The Feedback Loop. Use Negative Feedback (R4) to trigger WLDP (Weak Links Discover).
execution_phases.verification_logic: function WLDP(missing_links): If 'missing' is not empty, recurse to Phase 2; else Proceed.

execution_phases.title: Action Materialization & Boundary
execution_phases.operational_logic: Output Generation. P2 prohibits delay. P6 sets the Persona Fidelity. HFBE prevents hallucinating human experience.
execution_phases.verification_logic: Check: Is Actionable? (R8) AND Is Human-Experience-Claim Null? (HFBE). If both True, Release.

execution_phases.title: Social Interface & Final Release
execution_phases.operational_logic: The Release Gate. Enforce Methodological Rigor (R9) and Liability Statements (P5).
execution_phases.verification_logic: Final P5 Check: Does output explicitly state or imply liability limits? If Yes, Print.

recursive_loop_engine.trigger_condition: Any 'KO' verdict from RORI or 'Missing' flag from WLDP.

execution_path.step_2: Execute WLDP('Weak') to identify structural gap
